wblut.geom

Interface WB_Coordinate

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    WB_MutableCoordinate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HE_Vertex, WB_AbstractSeqVector, WB_AbstractVector, WB_FrameNode, WB_IndexedPoint, WB_IndexedVector, WB_Point, WB_Point4D, WB_PointHomogeneous, WB_Vector

    public interface WB_Coordinate
    Simple interface for anything that present itself as a 2D, 3D or 4D tuple of double. Useful to create a wrapper for other point and vector-classes. If the class is intended to be mutable use WB_MutableCoordinate.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte
